elem.annotation: Compute the meson spectrum. This version is a clone of the one below, however the xml output is written within the same chroma output file

elem.annotation: This is the duplicate of the spectrum run above, but the spectrum output is written to a separate file. NOTE: the user should normally write the spectrum output to a separate file, but for this test the xml spectrum output is contained within the chroma xml output solely for the regression test.
elem.Name: MESON_SPECTRUM
